name: YouCoin Metaverse
description: YouCoin is an ecosystem that provides reliable and diverse service governance facilities for the Metaverse and Web3. Its ecosystem includes decentralized finance, gaming, social, NFTs and DAOs. YouCoin is an ecosystem built on the SERO chain, and cross-chain with the Ethereum, Binance chain, etc., to easily achieve multi-chain interaction. UCON is the equity governance token of every ecosystem on the YouCoin Metaverse, and the total supply of UCON is 1,000,000. Through the incentive and burning mechanism of UCON, there will be a long-term upward trend with the closed-loop presentation of YouCoin Metaverse Ecological Finance.
